message.content:
I need to identify the line item and value that represents the increase in the amounts of tax accrued but not yet paid from the cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement provided, I can see that there is a line item called "Increase (Decrease) in Tax Payable" with a value of 243988.48. 

Tax payable represents taxes that have been accrued but not yet paid, so an increase in tax payable is exactly what we're looking for - it shows that more tax has been accrued than was paid during the period.

This line item appears in the Cash Flow From Operating Activities section, which is the correct classification for changes in working capital accounts like tax payable.

Therefore, the value of the increase in the amounts of tax accrued but not yet paid is 243988.48.

```json
{"solution": {"value": "243988.48"}}
```
